categories: Category:Shadows of the Empire Sourcebook fiction

nodes.text: Just Another Day's Work was a short story by Peter M. Schweighofer that was published in the Shadows of the Empire Sourcebook.

A swoop gang, under the employ of Jabba the Hutt and led by Big Gizz, came across an elderly Twi'lek named Whizzer. Whizzer owed Jabba both credits and spice. Big Gizz threatens Whizzer, and orders the heavily armored Spiker to kill the Twi'lek as a form of mocking intimidation. Whizzer bribes Big Gizz with a generous sample of Ryll, in order to avoid having the swoopers inform Jabba of his whereabouts.
